channel.title: Development of an rsps+community
channel.description:
Hey guys just thought i should let you know i have decided to spend money on getting a big RSPS up. This might take a while so bare with me, at this time i am looking for web coders and server coders to help me along with this project.
I have got a DEDI server situated in australia with 60 MB upload 160MB down Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650 3.0GHz 12MB L2 Cache 8 gig of ram 5000gig bandwidth so its pretty decent size.
If you would like to help with this project PM me and we will go from their. ( i have a webhost unlimited everything just need a domain need to figure a name)
Web Developer:
Requirements
* Strong graphic design skills, artistic sense, and fluency in Photoshop * Ability to work within and build upon the Runescape site style (easy to use for members) * Understanding of information flow, readability, and interface usability design principles * Passion for web design and games * Strong communication skills, ability to communicate with international team * Coding experience and basic understanding of XHTML and CSS * Knowledge about web localization * Extensive knowledge of PHP and MYSQL databases. * 1-2 years minimum work experience in related field
(other requirements) # Proficiency in creating interactive, animated web designs with Adobe Flash # Familiarity with web scripting languages such as Java Script and Action Script # Design related background and/or education # Bachelor's degree in a related field
Game Coder (taken) # Familiar with common Java web programming. # Experience with developing localized web sites/applications # Familiar with payment processing and e-commerce systems # 1-2 years experience in general Java coding
Note: these doing these two roles may also include some sort of customer support (forums live chat ect) so fluent english is a +.
YOU WILL BE PAID FOR YOUR WORK WITH US AS LONG AS YOU FULFILL YOUR TASKS ON TIME. (may have to wait a month untill my business number becomes approved then you will be paid)
To even be considered you need to have a site coded by you uploaded somewhere for me too view. Please dont give me those rubbish ucoz sites that are pre-made. You will be declined immediately.
Same goes for server/client coder you need to submit some of your own work NOT OTHERS.
EDIT: not quite sure where this is to fit in (move if need be)

item.title: Development of an rsps+community
item.dc:creator: @Gerrad Gerrad_
item.description:
@Gerrad wrote:

[quote]60 MB upload 160MB down[/quote]Sounds like a load of bullshit to me.

Read full topic

item.description:

Amayzing:

It’s going to be difficult finding a website developer that fulfills all of the requirements.

I do. Too bad I don’t wanna be a web developer.

item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

milomakes:

# Bachelor’s degree in a related field

thats what really is interesting to me, personally if i had a bachelors degree in any of those fields i’d probably be over a MITB.
good luck finding someone though.
i would personally try this site though. http://hiring.monster.com/indexProspect.Redux.aspx

Read full topic

item.title: Development of an rsps+community
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

[quote=“milomakes, post:4, topic:332769”][quote author=Amayzing link=topic=429199.msg3151210#msg3151210 date=1268547711]
It’s going to be difficult finding a website developer that fulfills all of the requirements.
[/quote]

yeah i can furfill all of them i just need someone to help me with consistant site updates new content ect.

and ill add you on msn now.[/quote]

I’d try to help but I don’t exactly meet all of the requirements.

I know HTML and CSS very well and I’m good with forums (I also have an Invision Power Board license).

Read full topic

item.title: Development of an rsps+community
item.dc:creator: @milomakes milomakes
item.description:
@milomakes wrote:

Hey guys just thought i should let you know i have decided to spend money on getting a big RSPS up.
This might take a while so bare with me, at this time i am looking for web coders and server coders to help me along with this project.

I have got a DEDI server situated in australia with 60 MB upload 160MB down Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650 3.0GHz 12MB L2 Cache 8 gig of ram 5000gig bandwidth so its pretty decent size.

If you would like to help with this project PM me and we will go from their. ( i have a webhost unlimited everything just need a domain need to figure a name)

Web Developer:

Requirements

* Strong graphic design skills, artistic sense, and fluency in Photoshop
* Ability to work within and build upon the Runescape site style (easy to use for members)
* Understanding of information flow, readability, and interface usability design principles
* Passion for web design and games
* Strong communication skills, ability to communicate with international team
* Coding experience and basic understanding of XHTML and CSS
* Knowledge about web localization
* Extensive knowledge of PHP and MYSQL databases.
* 1-2 years minimum work experience in related field

(other requirements)

Proficiency in creating interactive, animated web designs with Adobe Flash

Familiarity with web scripting languages such as Java Script and Action Script

Design related background and/or education

Bachelor’s degree in a related field

Game Coder (taken)

Familiar with common Java web programming.

Experience with developing localized web sites/applications

Familiar with payment processing and e-commerce systems

1-2 years experience in general Java coding

Note: these doing these two roles may also include some sort of customer support (forums live chat ect) so fluent english is a +.

YOU WILL BE PAID FOR YOUR WORK WITH US AS LONG AS YOU FULFILL YOUR TASKS ON TIME. (may have to wait a month untill my business number becomes approved then you will be paid)

To even be considered you need to have a site coded by you uploaded somewhere for me too view. Please dont give me those rubbish ucoz sites that are pre-made. You will be declined immediately.

Same goes for server/client coder you need to submit some of your own work NOT OTHERS.
